snippet: Raul Ibanez, who delivered another crucial hit for the Yankees on Wednesday, has observed and learned from players like Alex Rodriguez, previously his teammate with Seattle.
abstract: New York Yankees designated hitter Raul Ibanez, who is responsible for team's Game 3 American League division series win over Baltimore Orioles, idolized Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez when they both played for Seattle Mariners.
lead_paragraph: Raul Ibanez, who delivered another crucial hit for the Yankees on Wednesday, has observed and learned from players like Alex Rodriguez, previously his teammate with Seattle.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Ibanez Takes Teammates’ Best Qualities to Plate
headline.main: Taking Teammates With Him to the Plate
headline.print_headline: Taking Teammates With Him to the Plate
